attackStrategies.name: Queen Walk
attackStrategies.description: Begin with Archer Queen and Healers to create a funnel and take out key structures

attackStrategies.name: ZapDrag
attackStrategies.description: Use Lightning Spells to destroy Air Defenses, then deploy Dragons

attackStrategies.name: GiWiBo
attackStrategies.description: Giants as tanks, with Witches and Bowlers providing damage behind

attackStrategies.name: GoHo
attackStrategies.description: Golems to tank defenses, followed by Hog Riders for targeted destruction

attackStrategies.name: Super Dragons
attackStrategies.description: Powerful air attack using Super Dragons with support

attackStrategies.name: Hybrid
attackStrategies.description: Queen Walk followed by Miners and Hog Riders working together

attackStrategies.name: Electrone
attackStrategies.description: Battle Blimp with Electro Dragon and Clone Spells to create devastating chain damage

attackStrategies.name: Hydra
attackStrategies.description: Mix of Dragon variants for powerful air attacks
